mapper.select: SELECT ref.private_name graphPrivateName, graph.`name` graphName, type.type graphType, ref.point point, graph.id graphId FROM milog_analyse_dashboard_graph_ref ref, milog_analyse_graph graph, milog_analyse_graph_type type WHERE ref.graph_id = graph.id AND graph.graph_type = type.id and ref.dashboard_id = #{dashboardId}
